document_data.name: Knights of the Fire Drake
document_data.orgname: the Knights of the Fire Drake
document_data.mainbody: The '''Knights of the Fire Drake''' was a military order of [[crusader]]s who worshiped [[Kossuth]], the Tyrant Among Fire Elementals.
document_data.Activities: Members of the Knights of the Fire Drake protected the various sites that were holy to the [[Church of Kossuth]], lead holy campaigns and personally protected the [[Eternal Flame]].
